revised_title: Serological Differentiation of Bacillus Tetani: Isolation and Infection
tldr: The author investigates the isolation and serological differentiation of Bacillus tetani, discovering that there are at least three serological types of the bacteria. The study suggests that current antitoxin preparations may not fully protect against all types of B. tetani, highlighting the need for further research and development of more effective treatments for tetanus infections.
